content: Generate a paragraph where all words start with the letter "g".

Gazing grandly, Gabriel gently glided, gracefully guiding gallons of gleaming, golden grains towards the gigantic granary. Gigantic geese gathered, gobbling greedily, generating great gusts of gratitude. Gabriel, gratified, grinned genially, guaranteeing their generous gestures wouldn't go ungranted. Global gastronomes, gathering nearby, gratefully greeted Gabriel's generosity, generating a galaxy of goodwill. His gentle gestures guaranteed gastronomic greatness, giving everyone a glimpse of genuine grandeur.
